main event: A UFO sighting was reported on July 8, 1961, in Fairborn, Ohio, where an object appeared bright orange-red and dropped down rapidly before accelerating and disappearing to the northeast.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 2 minutes, It dropped down from a high altitude to around 1000 feet, It appeared to be the size of a basketball, It emitted no sound and left no trail, The object was classified as unidentified.
witness description: The witness described the object as appearing bright orange-red, about the size of a basketball.
